data.name: Magic Word Alchemist Wall Paper Set
data.detailed_description:
Magic Word Alchemist Wallpaper Set


A collection of high quality, high resolution wall papers. Wall papers vary in sizes and are up to 5184x3456 resolution in JPEG format.

FEATURES:
10 High Quality Wall Papers
High Resolution Images
JPEG Format

After installing this DLC, a folder titled DLC Wall Papers will appear in your Magic Word Alchemist app folder. This will contain the 10 high resolution Wall Papers.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Win 7 32-bit or higher
  • Processor: 2.0 ghz or higher
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 500 Megs VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
